snakeai.agent.simple_mc_agent module¶

Play function¶

snakeai.agents.simple_mc_agent.play(size=20, model_path=None, fps=7)¶

Play with an already trained SimpleMCAgent

If no path is given, a default (pre-trained) model will be used

Parameters

  • size (int, default=20) – the size of the board

  • model_path (str, optional) – the path to the trained model to load

  • fps (int, default=7) – The number of fps for the game

SimpleMCAgent¶

class snakeai.agents.simple_mc_agent.SimpleMCAgent(dim)¶

Bases: snakeai.agents.agent_interface.AbstractAgent

A class for an agent that uses a monte carlo method, with simplified states.

All Q values for the states are recorded. The agent chooses the action that maximizes Q. The values are updated only at the end of the episode.

Parameters

dim (int) – the side of the board

Variables

  • state_dict (dict) – The dictionary that stores Q values

  • GAMMA (float [0, 1]) – the gamma value for training

  • STEP (float [0, 1]) – the step size

  • epsilon (float [0, 1]) – the epsilon value for epsilon-greedy

  • DECAY (float [0, 1)) – the decay rate for epsilon

  • MIN_EPSILON (float [0, 1]) – the minimum value for epsilon when decaying

DECAY = 0.999¶
GAMMA = 0.995¶
MIN_EPSILON = 0.0001¶
STEP = 0.6¶
static default_count()¶

list : The default Value for N

static default_value()¶

list : The default Value for Q

execute(state)¶

Get the next action to do, given the state

Parameters

state (FrozenState) – the current state of the game

Returns

the direction in which to move

Return type

Actions

fit(old_state, action, rew, state, done)¶

Update the Q values

Parameters

  • old_state (FrozenState) – the state of the game before taking the action

  • action (Actions) – The action taken

  • rew (int) – The reward obtained

  • state (FrozenState) – the state of the game after taking the action

  • done (bool) – Whether the new state is terminal

classmethod load(dim, model_path)¶

Create a new agent from the given file

Parameters

  • dim (int) – The size of the board

  • model_path (str) – The path from which the agent is loaded

Raises

TypeError – If the data in the file is not of type dict

replay()¶

Replay the episode and learn the new values for Q

reset()¶

Prepare the agent for starting a new game

save(model_path=None)¶

Save the states values of the agent. If a path is not given, uses a default one.

Parameters

model_path (str, optional) – the position where the agent must be saved
